item.title: 德意志银行对阿斯利康的产品线表示担忧，阿斯利康遭到罕见抛售
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）分析师周四罕见地下调了阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的卖出评级，对该公司的药物管线，尤其是乳腺癌治疗药物管线持怀疑态度。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc got a rare sell rating on Thursday as Deutsche Bank AG analysts downgraded the British drugmaker, taking a more skeptical view on the company’s drug pipeline, in particular for breast cancer treatments.】

item.title: 电视上的 Instagram 是一个需要根本性变革的想法
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道 Instagram 的电视应用程序计划。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on Instagram’s plans for a TV app.】

item.title: 中美贸易战沸沸扬扬并演变为个人恩怨
item.description: 中美贸易战已经持续了大半年，但在本周，双方的相互指责达到了沸点，并做出了高风险外交中罕见的举动：它变得非常个人化。【原文：The US-China trade war has been simmering for most of the year, but this week marks the point at which the finger-pointing boiled over and did something rare in high-stakes diplomacy: It got very personal.】

item.title: 稳定币的蔓延敲响了金融稳定风险的警钟
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们将关注马克-施罗尔斯（Mark Schroers）和劳拉-努南（Laura Noonan）关于国际货币基金组织（IMF）和世界银行会议进展过程中人们对稳定币的担忧的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 中国对加拿大石油的需求将创历史新高
item.description: 加拿大对中国的石油出口有望在本月创下历史新高，因为随着亚洲巨头不再使用美国原油，加拿大对中国的石油购买量激增。【原文：Canadian oil exports to China are on pace for a record month amid a surge of purchases as the Asian giant pivots away from US crude.】

item.description: 宜家正将小镇作为新的增长引擎。【原文：IKEA is looking to small towns as a new engine of growth.】

item.title: 地缘政治引发非洲市场 2021 年以来最严重下滑
item.description: 去年，面对动荡的贸易环境和紧张的地缘政治局势，非洲主要金融市场遭遇挫折，市场深度减弱，交易额下降。【原文：Africa’s leading financial markets suffered a setback last year as market depth weakened and turnover declined in the face of a turbulent trade climate and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 丹-桑德海姆的 D1 为新私募股权投资基金寻求 10 亿美元投资
item.description: 随着对冲基金公司深入非流动性投资领域，D1 Capital Partners 旨在为新的私募股权基金募集超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：D1 Capital Partners aims to raise more than $1 billion for a new private equity fund as the hedge fund firm pushes deeper into illiquid investing.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Glow 募集 6500 万美元，阿波罗和 "有线牛仔 "马龙提供支持
item.description: 电话融资公司 Glow Services Corp. 已从包括有线电视亿万富翁约翰-马龙（John Malone）和阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Phone financing company Glow Services Corp. has raised $65 million in equity funding from backers including cable billionaire John Malone and Apollo Global Management Inc., as it looks to expand into new markets and develop new products.】

item.title: 美国太阳能产业萎缩，硅谷押宝太阳能初创企业
item.description: 美国一家初创公司正在推动安装家用太阳能和电池，以获得电力订阅服务，风险投资家们向该公司投入了7500万美元。【原文：Venture capitalists are among investors putting $75 million into a US startup’s push to install home solar and batteries for an electricity subscription — just as the residential market shrinks.】

item.title: 客户恢复 IT 支出，Infosys 收窄收入预期
item.description: Infosys Ltd.上调了全年收入预期的下限，寄希望于人工智能等技术支出的复苏。【原文：Infosys Ltd. raised the lower end its forecast for yearly revenue, banking on a revival in spending on technologies such as artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 英特尔和 AMD 股权赠送使股价飙升，尽管股价被稀释
item.description: 发行新股通常被认为是导致股东情绪低落的原因，因为股东的情绪会被稀释。但在这个人工智能大行其道的市场，这一逻辑被颠覆了。【原文：Issuing new shares is usually considered a recipe for souring sentiment as stockholders get diluted. But in this go-go artificial intelligence-crazed market, that logic has been turned upside down.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称俄罗斯炼油厂罢工，普京压力增大
item.description: 乌克兰总参谋部声称对俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）的萨拉托夫炼油厂进行了打击，北约盟国加大了对俄罗斯能源业的压力，以促使总统弗拉基米尔-普京坐到谈判桌前。【原文：Ukraine’s General Staff claimed a strike on Rosneft PJSC’s Saratov refinery as NATO allies ramp up pressure on Russia’s energy industry to bring President Vladimir Putin to the negotiating table.】

item.title: CCC 股价暴跌，公司成为做空者宁吉的目标
item.description: 在做空机构 Ningi Research 发布报告称这家波兰鞋类零售商存在会计问题后，CCC SA 股价暴跌。【原文：CCC SA shares slumped after short-seller Ningi Research published a report that alleged accounting issues at the Polish footwear retailer.】

item.title: 加拿大房屋销售在连续五个月增长后遭遇 "瓶颈
item.description: 由于新挂牌房源减少，加拿大 9 月份成屋销售下降，结束了连续 5 个月的增长势头。【原文：Canadian home sales fell in September, ending a five-month streak of gains as new listings decreased.】

item.title: 节假日求职人数激增，全职职位稀缺
item.description: 据求职平台 Indeed 的调查显示，由于没有全职工作，许多求职者似乎在做下一件最好的事情，那就是在假期寻找工作。【原文：Shut out of full-time work, many jobseekers appear to be doing the next best thing and hunting for a holiday season gig, according to research from the job search platform Indeed.】

item.title: 如果信用评分再次下调，法国债券将面临被迫抛售的风险
item.description: 在本周的喘息之后，迫在眉睫的信用评级决定有可能再次给法国债券市场带来更多的不确定性。【原文：Looming credit-rating decisions risk re-injecting more uncertainty into France’s bond market after a respite this week.】

item.title: 印度国营炼油厂计划从美国购买更多液化石油气，作为计划交易的一部分
item.description: 熟悉印度国有炼油企业计划的人士说，作为计划中贸易协议的一部分，印度国有炼油企业打算从美国购买更多的液化石油气，而牺牲中东的供应。【原文：India’s state-owned refiners intend to buy more liquefied petroleum gas from the US at the expense of Middle Eastern supplies as part of a planned trade deal, people familiar with the companies’ plans said.】

item.title: 中国价格战深化，比亚迪着眼非洲发展
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪股份有限公司执行副总裁李书福（Stella Li）在接受采访时表示，随着比亚迪加大全球扩张力度，该公司计划到2026年底在南非投资多达300个快速充电站。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD Co. plans to invest in as many as 300 fast-charging stations in South Africa by the end of 2026 as it ramps up efforts to expand globally, Executive Vice President Stella Li said in an interview.】

item.title: 新加坡丑闻后瑞银加强对亚洲客户的审查
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正在加强对其快速增长的亚洲财富中心客户资金来源的审查，迫使一些客户披露更多信息，这家瑞士银行正努力消除与监管机构发生进一步冲突的风险。【原文：UBS Group AG is increasing scrutiny of the sources of client money in its fast-growing Asian wealth hubs, pressing some customers into greater disclosures as the Swiss bank seeks to stamp out the risk of further clashes with regulators.】

item.title: 印度快速电子商务创业公司 Zepto 的估值达到 70 亿美元
item.description: Zepto 在明年上市前已获得 4.5 亿美元的融资，这表明投资者对印度电子商务这一快速增长领域的兴趣日益浓厚。【原文：Zepto has secured $450 million in funding ahead of a public listing set to take place next year, underscoring growing investor interest in a fast-growing corner of Indian e-commerce.】

item.title: 奇货可居：为什么纳税人现在拥有英特尔和 MP 的部分股份（播客）
item.description: 美国政府利用公共资金支持美国私营公司并不是什么新鲜事。拜登政府通过 CHIPS 和《通货膨胀削减法》，积极利用贷款和赠款来加速美国工业的发展。但特朗普政府的做法更为新颖：直接入股英特尔和 MP 等美国公司。但这种行动的法律依据是什么？直接入股的利弊又是什么？在本期节目中，我们将【原文：It’s nothing new for the US government to use public money to support private American companies. The Biden administration, via CHIPS and the Inflation Reduction Act, was aggressive about using loans and grants to accelerate US industry. But the Trump administration has been engaged in something more novel: taking direct stakes in US companies like Intel and MP. But what is the legal basis for such action? And what are the advantages and disadvantages of direct equity stakes? On this episode, we】

item.title: 默茨呼吁欧洲证券交易所向美国和亚洲发起挑战
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-默茨（Friedrich Merz）呼吁建立泛欧证券交易所，作为帮助企业应对来自美国和亚洲竞争的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz called for the creation of a pan-European stock exchange as part of a broader push to help companies deal with competition from the US and Asia.】

item.title: 股东拒绝新报价，巴伐利亚北欧公司交易存疑
item.description: 巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）的最大股东拒绝支持对这家丹麦疫苗生产商的甜蜜收购要约，这给交易带来了新的不确定性。【原文：Bavarian Nordic A/S’s largest shareholder refused to back a sweetened takeover offer for the Danish vaccine maker, casting fresh uncertainty over the deal.】

item.title: 印度税务机关突袭专有贸易公司 Graviton
item.description: 印度税务机关突袭了 Graviton Research Capital LLP 的当地办事处，因为印度正在加强对贸易公司的审查。【原文：India’s tax authorities have raided the local offices of Graviton Research Capital LLP as the country steps up scrutiny of trading firms.】
